attributes.action: RE-INSTATE THE FULBRIGHT SCHOLARSHIPS OF THE SEVEN GAZANS WHO HAVE HAD THEM RESCINDED, SO THAT THEY MAY STUDY ABROAD IN THE U.S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The U.S. State Department has revoked Fulbright scholarships for seven Gazans upon grounds emanating from the Israeli siege on the Gaza Strip. We demand that these Scholarships be immediately re-instated and the students are permitted to study abroad as a means of educating themselves out of the humanitarian crises imposed by the Israeli blockade.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
